r.s: Extension with routines for statistical computation.
r.d: Extension that provides few dozens routines for statistical computation.
r.n: - Fix bug in stats_stat_binomial_coef which causes segfault in some environments - Fix bug in stats_stat_factorial which leads infinite loop in some cases - stats_stat_factorial returns immediately when the value are reached to +INF - Change supported version to PHP 5.3 or higher
